actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules with amendment, H. Rept. 93-11.

official_title: A resolution to create a select committee to regulate parking on the House side of the Capitol.

summary.text: Creates a select committee composed of three members of the House of Representatives to regulate parking on the House side of the Capitol. Authorizes the House Office Building Commission to delegate to the select committee its duties as pertain to the supervision of the Architect of the Capitol in the assignment of parking spaces in the garages of the Rayburn and Cannon Office Buildings and two adjacent underground garages.

titles.title: A resolution to create a select committee to regulate parking on the House side of the Capitol.
